app.initError: The configuration information failed to be loaded. The system definition information was not obtained. Please try to refresh the current page.
app.initializing: The data is being prepared, please wait...
app.author: ronggang
app.name: PT Plugin Plus

common.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
common.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all records?

topbar.title: @:(app.name)
topbar.navBarTip: Click to show/hide the navigation bar
topbar.showNewTorrents: Get the first page of each tracker
topbar.showNewTorrentsTip: Search the first page torrents of each tracker according to the current solution

permissions.title: Thank you for choosing PT Plugin Plus
permissions.subtitle: In order to work properly, please authorize the required permission.

details.allSites: Access to all trackers for searching and get torrents data;
details.tabs: Read permission of the activity tab to display the PT Plugin Plus icon;
details.downloads: Download permission for batch download of torrents

searchBox.searchTip: Input keyword, IMDb numbers, then press <Enter> to search
searchBox.noSearchSolution: No Search Solution, please add a solution
searchBox.noAllowSearchSites: The site to search is not configured yet. Please configure it before.
searchBox.doubanTip: The above data comes from the Douban Movie API v2 ; if you do not want to display these results for pre-selection, you can close it in the General Settings

history.title: Download history
history.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
history.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all download records?

home.title: Overview
home.getUserInfoAbort: Get user profile request has been canceled. ({siteName})
home.getUserInfoAbortError: Failed to get user profile request cancellation. ({siteName})

reference.title: This project uses or references the following items
reference.thanks: The birth of PT Plugin Plus is based on these projects. Thanks to all the participants of the project, thank you for their contribution!

timeline.inputDisplayName: Please enter a name to display:
timeline.inputShareMessage: Please enter a message to display:

searchTorrent.title: Search Result
searchTorrent.multiDownloadConfirm: The number of torrents currently downloaded exceeds one, and the browser may prompt multiple times to save. Do you want to continue?
searchTorrent.sitesIsMissing: Please set up the site first
searchTorrent.optionsIsMissingErrorMsg: System parameters are lost, please re-open this page
searchTorrent.skipSites: Sites that do not support search at this time:
searchTorrent.noAllowSearchSites: You have not configured a site that allows search. Please go to [Site Settings] to configure.
searchTorrent.searchStartMsg: Ready to start searching, a total of {count} sites
searchTorrent.searchFinished: Search completed, found {count} results, time: {second} seconds.
searchTorrent.searchProgress: {count} results have been received, search is still in progress...
searchTorrent.sendTorrentToClient: Send torrent to the download server
searchTorrent.sendTorrentToClientSuccess: Send torrent to download server successfully
searchTorrent.sendTorrentToClientError: Send torrent to download server failed
searchTorrent.copyLinkToClipboardSuccess: Download link has been copied to the clipboard
searchTorrent.copySelectedToClipboardSuccess: {count} download links have been copied to the clipboard
searchTorrent.noReSearchSites: No sites that need to be re-searched
searchTorrent.doubanIdConverting: Trying to convert the douban id, please wait...

backup.title: Parameter backup and recovery
backup.subTitle: Note: The backup file is in plain text and may contain personal information. Please take care of it.
backup.restoreConfirm: Are you sure you want to restore the settings from the backup data? This will overwrite all current settings.

errorMessage.QUOTA_BYTES_PER_ITEM: The size of the content to be saved exceeds the Google limit (8K)

backup.clearFromGoogleTip: Clear backed up parameters from Google
backup.clearFromGoogleConfirm: Do you want to clear the backed up parameters from Google?

base.title: General
base.allowDropToSend: Send a link to the download server when dragging and dropping links to the plugin icon
base.clearCacheConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the cache? After the cleaning is completed, the system configuration information will be re-downloaded from the official website next time.
base.needConfirmWhenExceedSize: Confirmation when the total volume of torrent downloaded in batches exceeds the following size
base.searchResultRows: Number of results returned per site at the time of search
base.saveDownloadHistory: Enable download history to record torrent information sent with one click at a time
base.connectClientTimeout: Global timeout (milliseconds, 1000 milliseconds = 1 second), acting on the connection download server, downloading the torrent file, etc.
base.noClient: The download server has not been configured. Please configure the download service before selecting
base.cacheIsCleared: The cache has been cleared. If it needs to take effect immediately, please reopen the page.
base.autoRefreshUserData: Automatically refresh user data when the browser is open (Beta)
base.autoRefreshUserDataTip2: every day (if the browser opens after this time, it will be automatically refreshed when the browser is opened)
base.searchResultOrderBySitePriority: When the search results are clicked on the site header, they are sorted by site priority (effective after refreshing the page after saving)
base.showMoiveInfoCardOnSearch: Show movie and rating information when searching by IMDb number
base.getMovieInformationBeforeSearching: When entering a search keyword, load relevant information from Douban for pre-selection
base.maxMovieInformationCount: Display the maximum number of entries (1-20):
base.searchModeForItem: When clicking on a pre-selected item:
base.showToolbarOnContentPage: Enable site page plugin icons and toolbars (such as one-click downloads, etc.)

beforeSearchingItemSearchMode.id: Search by ID to get more accurate content, but it takes time to convert ID
beforeSearchingItemSearchMode.name: Fuzzy search by name to get more content

add.title: Add download server
add.helpMsg: Can't find the server type you want?

editor.name: Name of server
editor.addressTip: The server address contains the port, such as: http://192.168.1.1:5000/
editor.autoStart: Automatically start downloading when sending a torrent
editor.test: Test if the server can connect
editor.testOtherError: Other errors, the code returned by the server is: {code}

index.title: Download server configuration
index.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this download server?
index.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all download servers?
index.removeSelectedConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected download server?

add.title: Add download directory definition
add.pathTip: Press Enter multiple directories separated first as the default directory
add.selectSite: Select a site (not selected means all sites are available)

index.title: Download directory settings
index.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this save directory?
index.removeSelectedConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected save directory?
index.notSupport: This server type is not supported at this time

keyDescription.allowKeys: The following keywords can be included in the path:
keyDescription.siteName: Will be replaced with the current site name;
keyDescription.siteHost: Will be replaced with the current site domain name;
keyDescription.dynamic: An input box will pop up where the user enters the {key} part of the path;

index.title: Search Solution Definition
index.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this search solution?
index.removeSelectedConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected search solution?

editor.name: Plugin name
editor.pagesTip: The page starts with '/' to indicate the root directory of the website. After inputting, press Enter to add multiple, which can be a regular expression.
editor.scriptsTip: / means to load the script from the resource directory root, you can add multiple
editor.stylesTip: / means to load the script from the resource directory root, you can add multiple

index.title: Site plugin configuration
index.removeSelectedConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected plugin?
index.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this plugin?

add.title: Add Site
add.help: Can't find the site you want?

editor.defaultClient: Download server (if not selected, the default download server of the basic settings will prevail)
editor.name: Site name
editor.urlTip: The full address of the website, such as: https://www.github.com/
editor.passkeyTip: The key is only used to copy the download address operation. If you do not need this function, please leave it blank.
editor.cdnTip: If you use a different URL than the system definition, you can fill in the currently used website address, fill in one address per line, the first one will be used as the address used for the search.
editor.priorityTip: Can be used for search sorting

index.importAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to import site operations? This will import sites that have been logged in to the browser but have not been added.
index.removeSelectedConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected site?
index.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
index.title: Site settings
index.subTitle: Only the configured site will display the plugin icon and the corresponding function; the offline site will no longer participate in the search and information acquisition;

editor.name: Entry name
editor.entry: Entry page (defaults to the system's defined entry page if not filled)

index.title: Site search entry configuration
index.removeSelectedConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected search entry?
index.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this search entry?

statistic.note:
Note:
1. Chart history data comes from the overview page, manual or automatic update will be recorded;
2. Each tracker only saves one per day;

contextMenus.searchSelectionTextOnThisSite: Search only for this site "%s" related torrents
contextMenus.pluginStatusIsUnknown: The status of the plugin is unknown. The current operation may fail. Please refresh the page and try again.
contextMenus.sendingLink: Sending a link to download server
contextMenus.downloadClientGetFailed: Failed to get the download server.
contextMenus.sendTorrentToDefaultClient: Sent to the default server {client.name} -> {- client.address}

searcher.siteSearchConfigEntryIsEmpty: The site [{site.name}] is not configured with a search page. Please configure it first.
searcher.siteSearchEntryIsEmpty: The site [{site.name}] does not specify a search entry. Please specify a search entry first.

controller.downloadTimeout: The download server connection timed out, please check the network settings or adjust the server timeout!
controller.transmissionSuccess: {data.name} has been sent to Transmission, ID: {data.id}
controller.transmissionError: The link failed to send. Please check if the download server is available.
controller.getUserInfoSiteIsEmpty: No site needs to get user information
controller.noPermission: No permission, please go to user authorization

omnibox.search: Search for the relevant seed for "{text}" in the ({solutionName}) solution

user.getUserInfoFailed: Failed to get username and id
user.abortGetUserInfoFailed: Cancel request to get user information failed

contentPage.backgroundServiceIsStoped: Please refresh the page and try again
contentPage.actionExecutionFailed: {action} Execution failed, maybe background service is unavailable
contentPage.pluginTitle: PT Plugin Plus - Click to open the configuration page
contentPage.callbackFailed: {label} An error has occurred. Please try again.
contentPage.notSupported: This operation is not supported on the current page

buttons.downloadAllTip: Download all torrent from the current page to [{name}]
buttons.downloadAllToTip: Download all torrent from the current page to the specified server
buttons.needAuthorizationTip: Download all torrent file features require permission, click to go to authorization
buttons.downloadToTip: Download the current torrent to the specified server
buttons.sayThanksTip: Say thanks to the current torrent

contentPage.needPasskey: Please set the site key (Passkey) first.
contentPage.sendingTorrent: Sending a torrent to the server, please wait...
contentPage.dropInvalidURL: Invalid URL, please drag and drop download link
contentPage.getDownloadURLsFailed: Failed to get the download link, failed to correctly locate the link
contentPage.exceedSizeConfirm: The current page seed size is {size} has exceeded {exceedSize} {exceedSizeUnit}, is it sent?

search.needLogin: [{siteName}] needs to log in and search again
search.noTorrents: [{siteName}] did not find the relevant torrent
search.torrentTableIsEmpty: [{siteName}] is not targeting the torrent list, or there is no related torrent
